description:
Add fun to snowy days. Durable youth snowshoes that feature a one strap binding system that’s easy to use and fully adjustable. That makes them easy to get in and out of, and suitable for a wide range of footwear and quickly growing feet. The front crampons bite into firm snow and provide traction for the steeper sections.

  • Durable Torsion Deck™ allows an efficient, natural stride
  • Quicklock™ binding is easy to get in and out of with a single buckle
  • Articulation system maintains a natural foot position and prevents over rotation
  • Traction rails and toe crampons provide great grip on firm snow
  • Heel lifts for comfort and efficiency when going uphill
  • Fits shoe size: Junior 3 - Men's 9 or Women’s 11
name: Tubbs Flex HKE Snowshoes - Children to Youths
